TopicTitle: Waiter, theres a _____________ in my soup!

Articles.Content:
Waiter: That is for the undressed salad.

C:W, Is your soup staged?

Waiter: yes, we made it in several stages, starting with cutting the vegetables and ending with adding the dressing 

C: Waiter, what chemicals did you use to make this soup

[WAITER] We use Propellium and Badassium. Wait, why is your jaw on the floor? You've asked for the Kerbal Soup.

[ME] Waiter, there's a -__-_-___---_-___------__- in my soup!

No, there's a subway beneath our diner.

Waiter! Fried DynaSoar eggs, please.

Waiter: Sorry sir, but everytime we try they blow up and fly across the room, only to land in the Puns thread.

C:W, What is this in my bowl, are you sure you sell soup?

Yes, it's a special bowling soup.

Waiter! My phone needs to be fed.

Waiter: Sorry sir, but this is a State run soup kitchen. The Federal facility is across the road.

C:W, Some foil to block the RFID listening device that is in my soup bowl, please.

No hablo English

 

Waiter,     I found a over used meme in my soup

It's not a soup. It's an omemelet.

3 hours ago, Tundra said:

No hablo English

"English"? Not "Ingles"?

Nein, Ich spreche Deutsch. Ich spreche kein Englisch oder Spanisch. (No, I speak German. I don't speak English or Spanish)

Kellner, in meiner Suppe liegt ein Vertrag über eine Kraftfahrzeug-Haftpflichtversicherung!

(Waiter, there is a contract for motor vehicle liability insurance in my soup!)

Spoiler

I used motor vehicle liability insurance because in German that is  Kraftfahrzeug-Haftpflichtversicherung. It's the longest word in the standard German dictionary. There is a longer one that is 84 or 85 letters long.

Waiter: That is because you wanted a souped up vehicle.

C:W, There is some melancholy in my soup.

[WAITER] It's to remind you the old days.

[ME] Waiter, there's @Souptime with me! (Technically, you're in the same restaurant as me.) (I think.) (I may be wrong.) (or not?) (We'll see.)

We are waiting for all three of them gathering here: @Souptime, @Melontime, and @Teatime from the Discworld.

2 hours ago, ColdJ said:

C:W, There is some melancholy in my soup.

It's a meloncholy, it's a vegan diner.

***

Waiter! Can we have dinner in this diner?

Waiter: Yes sir. We prefer it to having a diner in the dinner.

C:W, A mental block of cheese please.

A compliment of the chef, sir. A whole carriage of them. Now you can build a cheese hut, as this is a Minecraft cafe.

Waiter! Break. Fast.

Yes, your fast will be broken soon.

Waiter! Theres nothing in my soup!

[WAITER] That's normal, you didn't ask for anything.

[ME] Waiter, there's a basilic in my soup!

You a wrong. It's not basilic, it's a basilisk, and you lose.

 

Waiter! I want supper instead of dinner. Is your diner a super?

[WAITER] Yeah, it's a superdinner with tons of servings of SRB.

[ME] Waiter, there's a SRB turning around in my soup!

Waiter: Someone thought it would keep it nice and hot but I think that may have been a mistake.

C:W, there are lots of Creepers bobbing in my soup.

Awwwwwwwww man.

Waiter!

There's a Super Suit in my Soup!

waiter, there's

  • 1 (3 pound) whole chicken
     
  • 4 carrots halved
     
  • 4 stalks celery, halved
     
  • 1 large onion, halved
     
  • water to cover
     
  • salt and pepper to taste
     
  • 1 teaspoon chicken bouillon granules (Optional)

in my soup

Okay, chef. Now just make what the client wants.

Waiter! Do 99 bottles of beer stay on the wall?

Waiter: That depends on whether you take 1 down, pass it around and count the number of bottles of beer still on the wall.

C:W, Is there a time anomaly in my soup? I feel like I have been at this table for months.

[WAITER] There is one for the thread but not the soup.

[ME] Waiter, there's a really, really tall building in my soup!
